attributes.action: Close down universities and conduct online classes.
attributes.additional_details: The outbreak of the coronavirus has killed two people and risen directly from more than 80 to more than 100 in two days, leaving the NHS without sufficient resources to treat patients. So universities and colleges students are petitioning to return to college after the outbreak, either by studying at home or by returning to their countries.
attributes.background: The hope is that universities will take online courses and turn exams into online exams

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We understand that you want universities to close and students to be able to continue their studies online, but its not clear what action you want the Government to take to achieve this.

The Government could take action to close universities during the coronavirus outbreak, but any decisions about how courses might continue while universities were closed would be a matter for individual universities.
